Reference

All functions

DataManagement()

Create a Data Management Object

OutputDataset()

Format a dataframe for output to nonmem

Query() Query_DV() Query_Cov() Query_CovT() Query_IndDose()

Create a Query object

R.installation.qualification()

Run installation qualification for PMDatR in current R environment

WriteCode.DataManagement()

Write R functions corresponding to a DataManagement objet

adjust_dose_time()

adjust the dose time

append.CovT()

Append time-varying covariates to an event data frame

append.events()

Append event data frames

as.data.frame(<domain.metadata>)

Format a metadata object as a dataframe

as_numeric()

safely coerce to numeric

bind_rows()

bind rows for dataframes with units

blank_to_missing()

Convert whitespace to a missing value

boxcox()

Applies Box-Cox transformation with known lambda

calc_addl()

calc_addl is a vectorized function which provides the number of additional doses given an time range and interdose interval

cfb_abs()

absolute change from baseline

cfb_percent()

percent change from baseline

cfb_ratio()

ratio change from baseline

compare_mappings()

compare_mappings

conc_to_molar()

conc_to_molar converts a concentration to molar

conditional_values()

Create a character column based on named conditions

convert(<pmunits>)

convert units to a chosen value

convert_units_from_list()

convert_units_from_list converts units for all output columns provided

count_if()

Increments a counter when the criteria is met

covariate_plots()

Summary plot of dataset

crcl()

Compute creatinine clearance

create.domain()

Create a domain object from file and mappings information

createDDD()

Generate Data Definition Table

format_date() format_time()

Date and Time formatting for text output

default_missing_column()

Create a default value in a dataframe column if the column doesn't already exist

diagnostics.domain()

## Diagnostics ## diagnostic functions should return a list of objects to be printed. For example, a list of character messages. ## or a data.frame

diagnostics_premerge()

Pre-merge diagnostic checks

domain()

Create a domain object from a list of settings.

domains.save.metadata()

Save meta data for a list of domains

.()

Generate a character vector from unquoted names

.getDependencyList()

Title

elapsed.time()

Compute elapsed time from beginning of POSIX vector

enumerate()

Give numeric identifiers to a vector of values

exclusion_codes()

Create an exclusion column

expand_addl()

expand rows that correspond to addl records

fill_NA() fill_locf() fill_nocb()

Fill NA values in columns

find_mismatched_TRT()

Find mismatched Treatment codes across domains

find_subjects_no_dosing()

Find subjects with no dosing records

find_subjects_no_obs()

Find subjects with no observation records

find_subjects_placebo_obs()

Find placebo subjects with positive DV

formatDDD()

Format a DDD object as a dataframe

getCov()

Processes domain data for merged covariates

getCovT()

Processes domain data for time-varying covariates

getDV()

Processes domain data for specified dependent variables (DV)

getDomain()

Processes source data

getIndividualDoses()

Processes domain data for individual doses

get_addl_dosing()

derive necessary information about addl and append to given dataframe

get_baseline()

Find a baseline value

get_metadata()

Gather metadata from a data frame

get_nm_attributes()

Get column attributes for nonmem formatted output

guess_dosing_sequence()

guess dosing sequence based on time of day

impute_fn()

impute a value to all missing

impute_value()

impute by a calculated value for any NA's in a column impute a value to all missing

increment_to_nominal_time()

increment a time record to some nominal time

is.number()

Determine if a value can be coerced to a numeric type

is_file_writable()

Check if a file is writable

is_one_of()

Test if value in x is one of several values

iso_duration()

Convert ISO duration to numeric

iso_to_posix()

Convert an ISO8601 date/time to POSIXct

load.domain()

Load a domain from a domain object or from settings

load.domain.mappings()

Load mappings list from mappings file

load_excel()

Load an Excel sheet from a workbook

load_sas7bdat()

Load a sas7bdat file into a domain object

load_table()

Load a delimited text file

load_xpt()

Load a sas xport file into a domain object

locf()

Fill NA values in a vector using previous non-NA value

lookup_intervals()

lookup intervals is a vectorized function that returns the intervals associated with provided dosing frequency information

merge(<Cov>)

Merge events with covariates

overlay_dosing()

overlay dosing records onto an existing ggplot

parse_usubjid()

Recombine pieces of a delimited string

plot_individual()

Plot individual subject profiles in NONMEM dataset

plot_outlier_byCuts()

Plot outliers by cutpoints

plot_spaghetti()

Plot NONMEM data as spaghetti plot

posix_to_date()

convert posixct to date

post.merge.refactoring()

Perform routine generic checks on NONMEM data and apply post-merge functions

post_process_dosing()

Apply ADDL and Missing doses to a dosing data frame

post_transform_message() post_transform_start() post_transform_end()

Send a message during a piped operation

power()

Applies a power transform y=a*x^b

pre.merge()

Pre-merge one domain with another

recode_values()

Recode/Replace values in a data frame column

relative_time()

relative time such that first record is at time 0

replace_values()

Replace values in a vector with supplied values

resolve_units()

resolve unit requirements across data frames

set_units()

set_units sets the units for a given vector

set_units_from_list()

set_units_from_list sets units for all columns that match a name

spread_()

spread that understands units

mean_() median_() sum_() min_() max_() first_() last_() nth_()

Summary functions overridden by PMDatR

strip_units()

strip attributes from a vector if they exist

strip_units_df()

strip all unit columns from a dataframe

summary_table()

Summary table of dataset

table_dv()

Summarise observations by EVID in NONMEM dataset

table_outlier_byCuts()

Summarise DV by strata or cutpoint to look for outliers

table_time()

Summarise time variables in NONMEM dataset

time_after_criteria()

time_after_criteria calculates the time after some filter critera within a group

time_after_dose()

time after dose

time_after_first_dose()

time after the first dose

time_diff()

Time difference

time_of_first_dose()

Time of the first dose

transform(<tbl_df>)

Add new variables to a data_frame

unit_cols()

get the units columns present in a dataframe and what the units are

units(<pmunits>)

retrieve measurement units from pmunits object

visualize_dosing()

visualize dosing history
